topic.title: Editing XML Documents in Text Mode

body.p: This section includes topics that describe how to work with XML documents in Text mode, including various features, actions that are available, and much more.

The Text editing mode is designed to be a simple, yet powerful, XML source editor. You can use this mode to edit XML code, markup, and text and it provides support to help you transform, and debug XML-based documents. It is similar to other common text editors, but also includes numerous specialized editing actions, a powerful Content Completion Assistant, a helpful Outline view, and many other unique features.
To switch to this mode, select Text at the bottom of the editing area.
